titleStmt.title: The first epistle. A crying voice of the holy spirit of love, wherewith all people are out of meer grace, called and bidden by H.N. to the true repentance for their sins, to the entrance into the upright Christian life, and to the house of the love of Jesu Christ.
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
